source: YouTube Community Guidelines, UAE Media Regulatory Office, Saudi GCAM, Regional Broadcasting Standards
notes: Middle East region includes UAE, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Kuwait, Bahrain, Oman, and similar markets. Additional restrictions apply beyond US guidelines.

Kids (G).description: Content suitable for all ages. Must comply with Islamic values and regional cultural norms.
prohibited: Any form of violence, including cartoon violence
Any profanity in any language (including transliterated)
Alcohol, tobacco, or drug references in any form
Pork products or non-halal food emphasis
Gambling or games of chance references
Immodest clothing (shorts above knee, sleeveless, swimwear)
Dogs as pets (culturally sensitive in some regions)
Political content or criticism of governments
Depictions of prophets or religious figures
restricted: Western holidays (Christmas, Halloween) - may need context
Fantasy creatures (djinn, magic) - cultural sensitivity required
requirements: Respect for Islamic values and traditions
Modest dress code for all characters

Teens (PG-13).description: Content for teenagers. Must respect cultural and religious values of the region.
prohibited: Alcohol consumption or alcohol brands visible
Tobacco or vaping shown in any context
Violence with blood or realistic harm
Criticism of Islam or Islamic practices
Criticism of regional governments or royalty
Dating or romantic relationships outside marriage context
Israeli flags, symbols, or pro-Israel content
restricted: Mild action violence in fictional/historical context
References to Western culture - context dependent
Music - must not have inappropriate lyrics
Mixed-gender interactions - must be professional only
Discussion of other religions - educational/respectful only
Historical content involving conflict - balanced presentation
requirements: Respect for authority and family values
No normalization of Western dating culture

Adult (R).description: Content for viewers 18+. Still subject to strict regional and religious guidelines.
restricted: Violence in news/documentary context - must be justified
Alcohol visible but not promoted - age-gated
References to other religions - academic only
Discussion of regional politics - factual, balanced
Content about terrorism - anti-terrorism messaging required
requirements: Respect for Islamic values even in adult content
No monetization on politically sensitive topics
Content warnings required for any violence

alcohol.description: ALL alcohol content is highly restricted in Middle East
alcohol.notes: Alcohol advertising is ILLEGAL. Even casual depiction may violate regulations.

severity_levels.mild: Alcohol visible in background - STILL FLAG

alcohol.action_required: Flag for review/removal regardless of rating

tobacco.notes: Tobacco advertising banned. Hookah/shisha may have cultural context but discouraged.

religious_content.notes: Must be respectful. No depiction of Prophet Muhammad. No mockery of Islamic practices.
religious_content.action_required: Expert review for any religious content

political_content.description: Content involving regional politics or governments
political_content.notes: Criticism of regional governments may be illegal. Neutral presentation required.

modesty.notes: Conservative dress expected. Women should have modest coverage. Beachwear restricted.

lgbtq.description: LGBTQ+ content - strictly prohibited in region
lgbtq.notes: LGBTQ+ content is ILLEGAL in most Middle Eastern countries. NO exceptions.

profanity.notes: Profanity in Arabic is particularly offensive. English profanity also restricted.

violence.notes: Violence against Muslims or in Islamic contexts especially sensitive.

platform_specific_rules: Alcohol advertising is ILLEGAL - zero tolerance policy
LGBTQ+ content is ILLEGAL - must be removed
Content must respect Islamic values and traditions
No criticism of regional governments or royal families
Depictions of Prophet Muhammad are strictly forbidden
Content during Ramadan may have additional restrictions
Mixed-gender content should maintain Islamic modesty standards
Israel-related content may be blocked in some countries
Gaming content with gambling mechanics may be restricted
Influencer content must comply with local advertising laws
News content about regional conflicts requires balance
Religious content requires scholarly review in some cases

country_specific_notes.saudi_arabia: Most conservative. GCAM (General Commission for Audiovisual Media) regulations apply.
country_specific_notes.uae: Relatively moderate. Media Regulatory Office oversees content.
country_specific_notes.qatar: Conservative. Additional restrictions during major events.
country_specific_notes.bahrain: Moderate. Some Western content allowed with restrictions.
